name: Portal Ball
description:
Use A and D or arrow keys to roll the ball. Charge your jump with space bar and release to jump.

Hit the switch panels to in the correct order to open the portal. If you hit any other surface, all the switches will reset.

Get your angles for your last bounce right, and carefully time your jump charges, because you'll lose control of the ball when the portal is open.

Edit the difficulty to change the size of the portal.

This was a bit of a rush, so more levels, sound and music etc will be coming soon. Hope you enjoy what's there!
